name: Rainbow Knight
description:
Hi guys!! I am a  15 years old boy from Taiwan!! (Middle school student)

In Taiwan, Middle school's 3rd grade is a quite hard time for student.

We need to prepare a lot of test for the final test that will affect and decide our high school in the future.

It is really tired for making games at this kind of time but I really like to do it!

I really enjoy the process when I am making games.(Except facing BUGS) :D

I hope you like my games!!

If you find some bugs, comment down below to let me know.    Thanks~ :D

=====================

PS

English is not my  mother tongue so sorry about my terrible grammar and messy words :D.

(My mother tongue is Chinese)

(I am Taiwanese not Chinese)

(I am from Taiwan not from China)
